title: Looking for friends to play with
body: As the title says, I'm looking for friends to play League with. All the people i used to play with don't play anymore and I don't enjoy playing games alone. Last season I peaked Plat5, Though rank isn't a problem. I am happy to play For fun in norms or competitively in Ranked or Flex, Just looking for some people to talk to and play with since I have a lot of spare time. If you're down comment or add me: VÃ¯per

replies.body: add me if u want in 2011 i was top 10 oce hon
